Source.Name: atomicparsley
Source.Summary: A program for manipulating metadata within MPEG-4 files
Source.Description: AtomicParsley is a lightweight command line program for reading, parsing and setting metadata into MPEG-4 files, in particular, iTunes-style metadata.

Package.Name: atomicparsley
Package.Summary: A program for manipulating metadata within MPEG-4 files
Package.Description: AtomicParsley is a lightweight command line program for reading, parsing and setting metadata into MPEG-4 files, in particular, iTunes-style metadata.
